trans-unit.source: Provides information about a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações sobre um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> para aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: Windows Forms includes built-in accessibility support that allows your application to work with accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Windows Forms inclui suporte interno de acessibilidade que permite que seu aplicativo trabalhar com aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: Examples of accessibility client applications include screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities.
trans-unit.target: Exemplos de aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade incluem utilitários ampliador e Revisor de tela, utilitários de entrada de voz, teclados na tela, dispositivos de entrada alternativos e os utilitários de aprimoramento de teclado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject> class inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> class to provide information about a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject> classe herda o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> classe para fornecer informações sobre um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> para aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: Each class that represents a visual part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>—such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>—also contains a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> to provide information about the containing class and perform actions on behalf of accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Cada classe que representa uma parte do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>— como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>— também contém uma classe que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> para fornecer informações sobre a classe continente e executar ações em nome dos aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: There are instances when you will want to provide additional information, such as the name or description of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Há ocasiões em que você deve fornecer informações adicionais, como o nome ou descrição do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle, para aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways of providing this additional information.
trans-unit.target: Há duas maneiras de fornecer essas informações adicionais.

trans-unit.source: To provide limited accessibility information for existing controls, set the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A> property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Para fornecer informações de acessibilidade limitada para controles existentes, defina o controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A> valores de propriedade, que serão relatados para aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: You should change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> property values only in rare situations, such as if you make a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> look like a list.
trans-unit.target: Você deve alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> valores de propriedade somente em situações raras, como se você tornar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> a aparência de uma lista.

trans-unit.source: Occasionally, you might require more accessibility information or different accessibility actions to be included with your custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: Ocasionalmente, você pode exigir mais informações sobre acessibilidade ou ações diferentes de acessibilidade para ser incluído no personalizados <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.

trans-unit.source: To customize accessibility, you can write your own class that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> classes and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para personalizar a acessibilidade, você pode escrever sua própria classe que deriva de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> classes e substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are writing a custom row header cell that implements unique custom actions, such as special hit testing within your cell, you should create a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.DataGridViewRowHeaderCellAccessibleObject> class and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você estiver escrevendo uma célula de cabeçalho de linha personalizado que implementa exclusivas ações personalizadas, como o teste de clique especiais dentro de sua célula, você deve criar uma classe que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.DataGridViewRowHeaderCellAccessibleObject> classe e substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> exposes its data structure by using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole> values to define the data table hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> expõe sua estrutura de dados usando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole> valores para definir os dados de tabela hierarquia.

trans-unit.source: For more information on exposing data tables to Microsoft Active Accessibility, see "Exposing Data Tables through Microsoft Active Accessibility" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a exposição de tabelas de dados para acessibilidade ativa da Microsoft, consulte "Expor dados de tabelas por meio de Microsoft Active Accessibility" na biblioteca MSDN em http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" /> class without setting the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" /> sem definir a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> that owns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> que possui o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" /> class, setting the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property to the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" /> definindo a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location and size of the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o local e o tamanho do objeto acessível.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds of the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os limites do objeto acessível.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject.Bounds%2A> property retrieves the object's bounding rectangle in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject.Bounds%2A> propriedade recupera o retângulo do objeto em coordenadas da tela.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the accessible child.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do filho acessível.

trans-unit.source: Returns the accessible child corresponding to the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o filho acessível correspondente ao índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject" /> that represents the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> corresponding to the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject" /> que representa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> correspondente ao índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of children belonging to the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o número de filhos que pertencem ao objeto acessível.

trans-unit.source: The number of child accessible objects that belong to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" /> corresponds to the number of visible columns in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: O número de objetos filho acessíveis que pertencem ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" /> corresponde ao número de colunas visíveis no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible" /> property is <see langword="true" />, the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.GetChildCount" /> method includes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" /> in the count of child accessible objects.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible" /> for <see langword="true" />, o método <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.GetChildCount" /> incluirá o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" /> na contagem de objetos acessíveis filho.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the accessible object that has keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o objeto acessível que tem o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject" /> if the cell indicated by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell" /> property has keyboard focus and is in the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject" /> se a célula indicada pela propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell" /> tem o foco do teclado e está no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> atual; caso contrário, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an accessible object that represents the currently selected <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto acessível que representa os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> selecionados atualmente.

trans-unit.source: An accessible object that represents the currently selected <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto acessível que representa os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> selecionados atualmente no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Name%2A> property returns a string that includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Name%2A> propriedade retorna uma cadeia de caracteres que inclui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation" />.

trans-unit.source: Navigates to another accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Navega para outro objeto acessível.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that represents an object in the specified direction.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> que representa um objeto na direção especificada.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> method will return for each `navdir` value.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir descreve o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> método será retornado para cada `navdir` valor.

trans-unit.source: Parameter value
trans-unit.target: Valor do parâmetro

trans-unit.source: Return value
trans-unit.target: Valor retornado

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Down> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Next>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Down> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Next>

trans-unit.source: An accessible object for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> below the current row.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto acessível para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> abaixo da linha atual.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Up> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Previous>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Up> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Previous>

trans-unit.source: An accessible object for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> above the current row.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto acessível para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> acima da linha atual.

trans-unit.source: An accessible object for the first <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> in the row.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto acessível para o primeiro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> na linha.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell> is the first cell if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell> é a primeira célula se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A> é `true`.

trans-unit.source: An accessible object for the last <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> in the row.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto acessível para o último <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> na linha.

trans-unit.source: All other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation> values
trans-unit.target: Todos os outros <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation> valores

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: para chamar código não gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> to which this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" /> applies.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> ao qual este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" /> se aplica.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> that owns this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> que detém este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property has already been set.
trans-unit.target: Ao definir essa propriedade, a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> já foi definida.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o pai do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject" /> that belongs to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject" /> que pertence a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: para chamar código não gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the role of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a função do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole.Row" /> value.
trans-unit.target: O valor <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole.Row" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection" />.

trans-unit.source: Modifies the selection or moves the keyboard focus of the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Modifica a seleção ou move o foco do teclado do objeto acessível.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the action that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Select%2A> method will perform for each `flags` value.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir descreve a ação que <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Select%2A> método executará para cada `flags` valor.

trans-unit.source: Parameter value
trans-unit.target: Valor do parâmetro

trans-unit.source: Action
trans-unit.target: Ação

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> takes focus.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> tem foco.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> in the row takes focus.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> na linha recebe o foco.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> é adicionada para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> is removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> é removido do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: When you specify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection.TakeSelection> value, the column of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> that currently has focus is the same as the cell that will take focus in the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.
trans-unit.target: Quando você especifica o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection.TakeSelection> de valor, a coluna do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> que atualmente tem o foco é o mesmo que a célula que será necessário definir o foco atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.

trans-unit.source: For example, if row 10, cell 3 has focus, and you specify <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection.TakeSelection> for row 15, then row 15, cell 3 will have focus.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se a linha 10, célula 3 tem foco e você especificar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection.TakeSelection> por linha 15, então a linha 15, a célula 3 terá o foco.

trans-unit.source: The first cell in the row will take focus if no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> has focus.
trans-unit.target: A primeira célula na linha terá o foco se nenhum <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> tem foco.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: para chamar código não gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit dos valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is the bitwise combination of the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Selectable" /> and <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Focusable" /> values.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é a combinação de bit a bit do <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Selectable" /> e <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Focusable" /> valores.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.State%2A> property includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Selected> value if the all of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> objects in the row are selected.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.State%2A> propriedade inclui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Selected> valor se todos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> objetos na linha são selecionados.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.State%2A> does not indicate whether the row has scrolled out of view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.State%2A> Indica se a linha foi rolado para fora da exibição.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Value%2A> property includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject.Value%2A> property for each cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Value%2A> propriedade inclui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject.Value%2A> propriedade para cada célula na linha.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Value%2A> returns the string "(Create New)" if the current row is a new row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Value%2A> Retorna a cadeia de caracteres "(Criar nova)" se a linha atual for uma nova linha.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: para chamar código não gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
